subject: JUnit Failure Trace not printed completely
msgSnippet: If the line of a failure trace is too witdth then in the JUnit view the line is cropped which means that I cannot read the whole line. What solution is there
messageBody:
If the line of a failure trace is too witdth then in the JUnit view
the line
is cropped which means that I cannot read the whole line.

What solution is there for this problem?

I use Eclipse 2.0.2.
